name: Deep Rooted Issues
description: Our team's Game Jam 2023 entry. The theme is "roots", and our game is based on a root event in which the protagonist goes under a series of misfortunate events based on one little silly occurence. The game follows a short story, and each level is a minigame you have to complete to progress. Everytime a minigame starts, you are presented with a instruction on what you're supposed to do. The gameplay is very inspired by the WarioWare series.
